message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $110.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $120?
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $115 for the product.
